revenue.notes: Record revenue with record Data Center and double-digit sequential growth

gross_margin.notes: Improved mix, cycle times, and supply execution

operating_expenses.notes: Higher infrastructure compute and compensation supporting Rubin, GB300, networking, and software

gross_margin.notes: Includes H20 charge/release adjustments but excluding net approx still 73.6%

highlights: Blackwell Ultra is ramping at full speed; record third-quarter Data Center revenue with GB300 contributions and NVLink networking enhancements
Partnerships with OpenAI, Google Cloud, Microsoft, Oracle, xAI, Anthropic, and sovereign programs expanded multi-gigawatt deployments
Rubin CPX and NVQLink platform announcements plus NVLink Fusion collaborations with Fujitsu and Intel underline next-gen roadmap
GeForce RTX Series launches (Borderlands 4, Battlefield 6) with DLSS 4 & Reflex and GeForce Now enhancements sustain demand
DGX Spark shipments and RTX Pro/Omniverse innovations drive renewed enterprise workflows

Automotive_and_Robotics.notes: Drive AGX Hyperion 10 platform and Uber Level 4 fleet expansion

cash_paid_pp&e.notes: Supports GB200/GB300/Blackwell Ultra capacity and Omniverse simulation sites

data_center_innovation: Blackwell Ultra and GB300 dominate revenue with NVLink rack-scale systems, while Rubin remains on track with Vera, Rubin GPU, CX9 SuperNIC, and Quantum-X interconnects
NVLink Fusion partnerships with Fujitsu and Intel plus NVQLink quantum interconnect and Spectrum-XGS scale-across offerings differentiate AI factory networking
networking: Networking revenue surged to $8.2B (162% YoY) with Spectrum-X, Spectrum-XGS, InfiniBand, NVLink, Quantum-X, and BlueField-4 fueling AI factory performance
ecosystem: Partnerships with OpenAI (10GW commitment), Anthropic, AWS/Human, Palantir, Nokia/6G, and U.S./European sovereign clouds highlight ecosystem breadth
Omniverse, Cosmos, RTX Pro servers, and RTX Remix/RTX Blueprint updates accelerate robotics, industrial, and creative AI use cases
strategic_mentions: Blackwell wafer production on U.S. soil, NVLink adoption by Meta/MSFT/Oracle/xAI, and Spectrum-X annualized revenue >$10B underscore resilience
Customer roadmap includes Anthropic (1GW), huge government builds (Solstice, Equinox, industrial AI cloud), and RoboAI momentum

q4_guidance.other_income: ≈0.5 billion USD income excluding equity gains
q4_guidance.notes: Assumes no China Data Center revenue; mid-70s margin exit

full_year.operating_expenses: Forecast high-30s YoY growth as infrastructure spend scales
full_year.capital_allocation: Board increased buyback authorization to support growth while financing new supply chains
